item.title: AL: 4. Quicksort
item.description: This chapter I learned divide-and-conquer and quicksort, both of which can help me solve problems elegently. 1. Divide & Conquer It can take us some time to understand D&C. Therefore, we will see some problems to learn about it. Example If you are a farmer with a large land and plan to divide this farmland evenly into square plots. Besides, the plots must be as big as possible.
